about.title: About me
about.p-1: Hello! My name is Roman, I'm a frontend developer. I have been interested in computers and everything related to them since childhood. But I started taking my first steps in the IT field at the Lviv STEP Academy.
about.p-2: My goal is to ensure high quality code and efficient website performance. I use best practices and development principles to ensure optimal page loading speed, as well as scalability and reusability of components.
about.p-3: I have knowledge of Node.js, which allows me to develop the server side of applications and perform various server-side tasks. This gives me the opportunity to understand the full cycle of web application development and interaction with databases.
about.p-4: Beyond that, I am always open to learning new technologies and deepening my knowledge. I strive to constantly improve and apply new tools to create even cooler and more innovative projects.
about.p-5: If you are looking for a responsible and persistent developer, I am ready to take on new challenges and collaborate with your team.
